resources.string: \t\t\t\tFusion is the annual Techno-Cultural festival of, PadmabhushanVasantdada Patil Pratishthanâ€™s College of Engineering. Fusion means a combination of different materials, which in our case, is a mixture of technical and cultural activities .Fusion is a platform for students to show off their Technical and Creative skills. It is a tradition of this college which is being followed for more than 17 years now. Fusion: Glitters of unity and exuberance, a three day long extravaganza. An event that will provide not only fun and frolic, but the opportunity to interact with pupils of different institutions .Fusion is the platform to showcase talent of a student. The event will host a bagful of activities.
